name: Cinemoji: Series
description:
Test your deduction skills and your tv series or streaming series knowledge

See plot summary of the series

Some series's emojis are hard to guess

Features:


  • 100 series to guess.
  • Original soundtrack.
  • Minimalist Interface.
  • Type the answer with keyboard or click in buttons with mouse.
  • Plot summary of the series.
  • It's pretty hard to guess alone all emojis.
  • Has hidden achievments...
